attributes.action: remind the BBC that they have a duty to provide quality news coverage in the morning.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It must be obvious to all that BBC Breakfast has now descended to concentrating on excessive coverage of trivial matters, rather than quality reporting of REAL news. In addition, the style of this programme is entirely viewer unfriendly, news items being provided in unnecessary "instalments". If you would like BBC1 to return to providing an intelligent news service in the mornings, please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
